content: I don't have personal preferences, but i could suggest that the street food tour or historic center food tour would be a great option for a first-time visitor to mexico city, as they provide a great introduction to the city's vibrant food culture and local cuisine. they offer a great variety of authentic and tasty dishes at reasonable prices, and you'll get to try some popular mexican street foods such as tacos, tamales, and churros. these tours provide a great sense of the local neighborhoods and the culture as well.
